column2: A simple Minecraft clone written in C using modern OpenGL (shaders).

column5:
Merge pull request #177 from satoshinm/filefail

Show error and exit on shader/texture file open failure
Show error and exit on shader/texture file open failure

Merge pull request #176 from satoshinm/missingcontrols

Add missing controls to readme: ctrl, T, /, and `
Add missing controls to readme: ctrl, T, /, and `

Merge pull request #168 from etamme/master

update glfw files with ifdef to get M_PI when using GCC
Add AUTH_REQUIRED flag to make auth optional

Merge pull request #158 from mczero80/master

Updated gcc command in README.md, because it fails on Ubuntu 14.04

Merge pull request #135 from anders-dc/master

Added libcurl dependency for Ubuntu/Debian GNU/Linux
Added libcurl dependency for Ubuntu/Debian GNU/Linux
use char in map for memory savings
some edits in prep for create_chunk to be threaded too
working! chunks load faster but frame rate is reduced during loading
starting work on worker threads for chunk gen
added time_changed flag, only dirty if light value was changed
ensure_chunks has priority of notion - defers light loads
day/night cycles are 10 minutes, nights are longer
Synchronize day/night cycle between server and client
only dirty neighbors if there are lights
handles chunk boundaries, but needs work - too slow
added REDRAW, send CHUNK at end of transmission, don't use KEY for redraw
increased viewing distance and made it changeable at runtime
removed unneeded index on block table
no fog in ortho mode, use appropriate zfar in ortho mode
moved static globals in main.c into a Model struct
no need to cache chunks in cleanup
added cleanup helper to server, looks for blocks in db that match the default world block and can be safely deleted
only send non-default blocks on initial chunk request?
support local config file in server
send client original block if action not allowed

added world.py so server can know default world

not used in the server yet
paste in chat, paste commands, do it however
login and logout commands in client
added DEBUG and LOG - not used yet
support private messages in server with @nick
glfw bug fix with screen recording
visible chunks have priority in ensure_chunks
server cleanup; allow newlines (\r) in signs
track min and max y value per chunk for use in chunk_visible
refactored main.c so the main function isn't so big
sign caching needs work, temporary workaround
performance tweak with early check in is_transparent
only redraw chunk when server has sent all blocks for it
slight client refactor - give main all commands available at once

performance enhancement - don't hit db if no sign to delete

client performance improvements

no strlen

performance tweaks
no need to include src directory
suppress recv error message on normal quit
made night time less dark - it was annoying
DAY_LENGTH <= 0 causes it to always be noon
don't rotate plant when showing selected item
working on signs on top of blocks
moved *.c and *.h files into src/ subfolder
don't generate polygons for space characters
working on kerning and word wrap for signs
show sign text while typing it
prevent tile bleed over, restored ao on clouds
added item.h, item.c to manage items and attributes
disable wool for now, need to settle on colors
added list of user-placeable blocks/plants - flowers can be used now
added level of indirection in texture for blocks and plants
larger ortho view, don't show clouds in ortho
perf improvement in gen_chunk_buffer via reduced map_get calls
put ao value in uv attribute
only show player name in crosshairs if they are near
removed ability to disable sky dome - too much code
don't alloc on stack for flip_image_vertical
added flip_image_vertical so textures aren't upside down
ring buffer refactor, sqlite commits on worker thread
moved 3rd party noise library to folder
sky darkens even with sky dome off
don't wait for client thread to exit
single sqlite3 db object, multiple threads

added several SHOW_* options to enabled/disable

rendering of various things
removed second level of clouds - unnecessary
updates for mac app bundle and sandbox
show # of triangles rendered, tweaked start time
Repainted sky from scratch: sunrise, sunset, greenish tint at noon.
Merge branch 'reduce-blues' of https://github.com/emilis/Craft into sky
Reduced artificial blue color for night sky.
allow tree leaves to be built
accept player id from server for self
only ensure followed chunks if observing
more attrib members for all program uniforms, etc.

Merge branch 'master' into follow

Conflicts:
	main.c

Merge pull request #88 from emilis/wheelfix

Fixed selecting block types with mousewheel.
Fixed selecting block types with mousewheel.

Merge branch 'master' into follow

Conflicts:
	main.c
added Attrib struct for cleaner code
improved textures. added some new ones
refactoring to include vertex, normal, uv data in single buffer
sqlalchemy no longer required for server
builder.py supports set operations for more complex models
client_stop at very end of main
remove sqlalchemy, commit on a timer
Notify the client when a command was not found
remove highest_block call for U command

fix #7 with changes in database values and...

client/server communication
clients must upgrade

Merge branch 'key-config' of https://github.com/emilis/Craft

Conflicts:
	main.c
removed most console output - shown in window now
show typing text in main window
show debug info and one chat message in the top corner
clear depth buffer between 3d and 2d draws
code refactor, able to show flower item (not enabled yet)
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/fogleman/Craft into key-config
Moved user configuration into a separate file.
basic chat in the console (type from the main window using 't')

Made size easily modifyable.

Exactly this.

Its just a small addition...
Moved the width and height values from line 787 (... I think) to the first lines of the file so they are easy to change.

server supports chat, client prints received chats to console

(no support for writing chat messages yet)

Merge pull request #49 from moonsspoon/master

adding new player texture
player cube has 6 distinct faces in texture
always ensure chunks within distance 1 chunk
move player if server sends intersecting block
threads for socket.send work to avoid server hangup
fix plant and player normals, not sure how
mat_apply helper to multiply an array of 3-tuples with a matrix
chunk_visible only effective at "low" y values
moved cube functions into separate file
moved matrix functions into separate file
refactored function names, reorganized a little
set dirty flag in make_chunk and update_chunk
destroy the plant above a broken block
use a macro for iterating over map entities
faster loading, ability to teleport to others

Merge pull request #34 from kaezarrex/master

Spacebar moves up while in fly mode.
Spacebar moves up while in fly mode.
client support for other player disconnections
ensure_chunks before main loop, even when networked
select blocks with a middle mouse click
Add scrollwheel support for switching between blocks
fix for retina MBP - i think

Merge branch 'master' into socket

Conflicts:
	.gitignore
	CMakeLists.txt
added glfw repo as a submodule
added glfw repo as a submodule
fixed chunk->dirty bug, not sure how
rollback - moving networking to separate branch

key control changes

* zoom with LSHIFT
* ortho mode with F
* Z,X,C,V,B,N to move straight in each of the axes
show selected item in bottom corner
new tile, new window size and title
proper aspect ratio in ortho mode
pulling in some updates from shadows branch
moved some logic to vertex shader
fog fix by passing uniform camera location
bind 0 and disable vertex arrays when done
tab to toggle flying, 1-4 to select blocks
right click to create, need fix for negative chunk
chunk struct, don't alloc huge stuff on stack
render exposed faces only, no more instanced draw
hash map model, render exposed blocks only
